api_key.Description: The api key of the firewall

hostname.Description: Hostname/IP address of the Palo Alto Networks firewall to connect to

json_config_file.Description: Retrieve the provider configuration from this JSON file

logging.Description: Logging options for the API connection

password.Description: The password (not used if the ApiKey is set)

port.Description: If the port is non-standard for the protocol, the port number to use

timeout.Description: The timeout for all communications with the firewall

username.Description: The username (not used if the ApiKey is set)

tags.Description: Administrative tags for the address object

vsys.Description: The vsys to put this address object in

type.Description: The type of address object (ip-netmask, ip-range, fqdn)

vsys.Description: The vsys to put this address object in
The vsys to put this administrative tag object in
The vsys to config DAG tags for

mode.Description: The interface mode (layer3, layer2, virtual-wire, tap, ha, decrypt-mirror, aggregate-group)

rulebase.Deprecated: This parameter is not really used in a firewall context.  Simply remove this setting from your plan file, as it will be removed later.

type.Description: NAT type (ipv4 default, nat64, or nptv6)

vsys.Description: The vsys to put this object in (default: vsys1)

rulebase.Deprecated: This parameter is not really used in a firewall context.  Simply remove this setting from your plan file, as it will be removed later.

vsys.Description: The vsys to put this object in (default: vsys1)
